name: SBOT
overview: SBOT is a high-tech android with truly exceptional capabilities, it has been built with all the necessary elements to repel any type of attack, with a high-intensity photonic laser as a defense element. The EARTH is about to be attacked by an alien ship hidden on the dark side of the Moon, that is why SBOT has been sent from the blue planet, EARTH, it has traveled to the Moon our asteroid in which in its Inside is an Alien Mothership whose mission is to destroy the EARTH. Our intelligence base on EARTH has detected that the ship consists of several areas in which we will have to locate the necessary components to enter the escape area, next to it we have an area where the deposit is located, we will have to escape in our second ship that was captured years ago, locating the escape zone will be the key to our success in the mission. After that and upon arrival on earth, they inform SBOT that they have stolen a stellar map which they have broken into several parts that will need to be located, the map with all the parts will allow us to avoid new attacks on our civilization in the future and that SBOT can take that well-deserved rest to replenish energy.
